documents.title: stuff to do tonight
text: if you 're in bristol , go and see the rip-roaring theatrics of indie icon st vincent at the o2 academy .
if you 're in birmingham , have a goggle at japanese space rockers acid mothers temple & the melting paraiso ufo at the flapper as they venture into the cosmos .
if you 're in london , go and see folkies this is the kit at at/on/in the queen elizabeth hall roof garden .
if you 're in newcastle , head on over to the cluny to see ex-herman dune leader stanley brinks play with prolific loughborough band the wave pictures .
boyhood , guardians of the galaxy , the rover and the congress are still on at the cinema .
meanwhile , over on the small screen , you can catch up with the kids of thornhill community academy in educating yorkshire .
elsewhere , there 's a spin-off series detailing the events of the battle of amiens on bbc3 , preceded by a world cup qualifier between the wales and england women 's football teams .

documents.title: morrissey 's woes continue
text: roll up , roll up , who wants me next ?

samuels/rex the rift between the mozmeister and his former u.s. record label harvest reached a climactic conclusion yesterday with a mightily persuasive statement titled 'please close the door behind me ' .
below are some of the best bits .
he starts off stating that capitol imprint harvest records originally appeared as a saintly beacon of light .
times were rosy , but then the tv ad never appeared and my hackles bristled as my bristles heckled .
there 's more subhuman species-denying : the label responded with frosty aloofness , and i suddenly realized that we were not , after all , of the same species .
moz describes the dramatic moment before they dropped him : mutual mistrust exploded between harvest and i , and with fashionable pessimism , the label boss yawned ooft , the ire !
this would not have happened to the teletubbies .
this line is actually good : just one weak-chinned drone can assert the fist of injustice and all of our efforts are flushed away .
basically , you ca n't help but feel a little sorry for the guy .
the harvest experience tells us that despite the blinding flash of teeth and smiles , it does n't take much for the coin to flip and suddenly we 're all compromised and shattered .
you can read the whole statement here .

documents.title: some lunchtime reads
text: just before you start noshing away , here are some long and short reads for your casual , sandwich-charged perusal .
none of them - i think - discuss the thorny subtexts to the 'anaconda ' or 'shake it off ' visuals .
so do n't worry about that .

1 ) over at the vulture , margaret attwood talks about the forthcoming darren aronofsky-directed hbo adaptation of her maddaddam novel - specifically , how her hybrid race of crakers are going translate to the screen .
2 ) the quietus board the funkship with george clinton .
what with both funkateer clinton and bootsy collins ' current live shows selling out everywhere at the moment , i predict a massive funkadelic revival next year .
3 ) lauryn hill releases long-time live staple 'black rage ' , dedicating it to the demos in ferguson and posting the incredibly apposite lyrics on her website .
4 ) finally , another perspective on the unrest here , from killer mike , who appeared on cnn last night .

documents.title: a super-group of sorts
text: two bands you 'd never associate with each other - together , at last .

dreamshow ( the caps are super important ) is the new project from new york punk constantine v , who sings in a sandpapery voice over music from his buddies mason from cerebral ballzy and jahphet from tv on the radio .
combining the the rough edge of the former with the more melodic tendencies of the latter , chasing control is a strokes-style indie-rock ballad that actually tugs at the heartstrings .
huzzah !

documents.title: pop stars with degrees ( sort of )
text: pj harvey , clasping her award for oh wait metcalfe/getty images you may have heard the news yesterday that pj harvey has been awarded an honorary degree from goldsmiths university in recognition of all those great records she 's been churning out over the past 25 years .
london 's goldsmiths is the same creative institution where blur met , and also where katy b and james blake shared music classes .
joining the likes of jools holland and some guy , brian , from placebo , she 's one of many pop stars who 've been belatedly recognised for their musical achievements with a title from the uni .
here are some other big names who 've received similar from other establishments .
brian may this one 's fair enough .
an honorary doctorate of science from the university of hertfordshire in recognition of the queen guitarist 's life-long contribution to music .
sounds weird , but before the band , he studied astronomy to phd level and throughout his life , he 's continued his intergalactic studies as a sideline hobby .
according to the citation , he 's also 'an expert in the field of victorian stereoscopic photography ' .
so that too .
yep , yep , that leap definitely deserves another degree fireman/redferns via getty images rudimental a more recent accolade , here , for piers aggett and kesi dryden from rudimental .
they were music tech students at leeds met 'back in the day ' , and received an honorary masters in music from the uni earlier this year .
in a rather motherly speech , vice-chancellor susan price said , 'we could not be more proud of them ' .
well , innat nice !

carl barat mysteriously described as a 'reflective performer ' in a statement by a winchester uni official , the libertines man received an honorary degree in recognition of his influential contribution to the arts .
there may or may not have been a smidgen of nepotism involved , as his mother was working at the place at the time , and his sister apparently graduated in drama at the same ceremony .
but hey look !
here he is in a gown and a beret ( obviously ) .
'where is my bayonette ? ! '
bruce dickinson the iron maiden frontman received an honorary doctorate of music from his old student haunt queen mary , in 2011 .
originally a history undergraduate , he said upon receiving the honour : 'that was what they [ my parents ] wanted to hear so that was my cover story .
when i got down there , i started immediately finding and playing in bands ' .
an inspiration to us all on this fine gcse results day .
